member.name: P:GCT.Manager.AffiliateManagement.Utilities.AffiliateCodeUtility.DefaultAffiliateCode
member.summary: A fallback code to return should everything else fail.

member.name: P:GCT.Manager.AffiliateManagement.Utilities.AffiliateCodeUtility.DomainMapFile
member.summary: An absolute path to the CSV file or the file content.

member.name: P:GCT.Manager.AffiliateManagement.Utilities.AffiliateCodeUtility.AffiliateCodeCookieName
member.summary: Affiliate Code cookie name to search with in the HttpCookieCollection. Default is "AffCode".

member.name: P:GCT.Manager.AffiliateManagement.Utilities.AffiliateCodeUtility.OverwriteCookie
member.summary: Gets or sets the rule whether to replace existing cookie value. Default is False.

member.name: P:GCT.Manager.AffiliateManagement.Utilities.AffiliateCodeUtility.CookieExpiryDuration
member.summary: Number of day until cookie expiration. Default is 7.

member.name: M:GCT.Manager.AffiliateManagement.Utilities.AffiliateCodeUtility.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.param: An Affiliate Code to return should all code-acquiring methods fail.
An absolute path to the CSV file or the file content.
Affiliate Code cookie name. Default is "AffCode".
True if domainMapFileName is the content file instead of the file path; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:GCT.Manager.AffiliateManagement.Utilities.AffiliateCodeUtility.GetAffiliateCode
member.summary:
Gets the preferred Affiliate Code for member registration purposes based on the current business rules.
Comprised of 3 sequential code-acquiring methods, this process was designed in compliance with WCR-1015.

member.name: T:GCT.Manager.AffiliateManagement.Utilities.CsvUtility
member.summary:
Incredibly simple CSV parsing utility, written by yomanto.taro@xuenn.com.
Consider using the more dedicated one as you scale. See https://www.nuget.org/packages/CsvHelper />.
